title: Legacy Launcher goes back to beta.
body:
I created a shortcut for the legacy client on lol.launcher.admin.exe but when I click launch, it sends me back to the open beta client, making the shortcut pretty useless. However, it works if I change it from the open beta client to the legacy client.
Is there any confirmed fix to this or no?

replies.body:
We just [posted a workaround ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/irEothGt-workaround-for-launching-the-legacy-client)on this in the client boards.  Try following modifications to get the legacy client to launch:

- Go to your League of Legends install folder. Default is (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) go to \RADS\system 
- Locate the user.cfg file and open with notepad
- Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no 
- Save and launch League of Legends again.

Hope that helps!
Thanks for the help, Porocles. Much appreciated from the Rift. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
